summary: this vacuum is too heavy , the cord is too stiff and makes it uncomfortable to manage . the tangles are too hard to remove and to find a clog is necessary to disassemble the whole unit .

the equipment can be very bulky and the cable is quite rigid which can cause it to be uncomfortable to use , in general it is relatively light and easy to use .
reviews: true, it isn't self-propelled, but it is relatively light for its size and fairly easy to push around.
too bulky, cord is unusually stiff and tangles are impossible to remove.

summary: the accessories for this vacuum are ok. the brush is not long enough so it makes it hard to clean small places , but is wide and is better if you want to clean quickly .

the accessories are ok but they could be better . the wide brush is great to clean big spaces because it is wide . bags fill up very quickly , they are too small and expensive .

i would prefer to have the on/off button on the handle of the cleaner not the cannister.

summary: this device is hard to use , very heavy and the brush although is wide and useful for cleaning but it is n't good for small spaces like corners .
